resources.string: Time to build on your relationship
Time to build on your relationship.
How often would you like new reminders to occur?
Not set. Tap to set number for texting.
Not set. Tap to set phone number.
Not set. Tap to set partners name.
Not set. Tap to put your own reminder custom message here.
Not set. Tap to put your own reminder custom message here..
Not set. Tap to put your own reminder custom message here.
It\'s time to build on your relationship\n\n

Getting started is easy! 

All you have to do is setup your partners phone number so that you can call or send them a text message. If you wish, you can even adjust how often you want to receive these reminders and suggestions. 

You can choose to use a distinct notification sound. 

Once you have completed the settings you can close this app and you will be reminded at random times in the future with relationship building suggestions. 


"

string-array.name: suggestions_array
string-array.item: Give your partner a loving touch. I.e. Hand on back or shoulder etc…
Share something new of interest with your partner. I.e. \'I just saw or read… \'
Send a text that connects you emotionally. I.e \' I can\'t get enough of my sugar \'
Send a text that bonds your sprit with that of your partner. Ie. \" Remember that time…\"
Send a picture or share a funny quote you came across
